title: Odeon Condensed
content:
I am trying to find a typeface, it's called Odeon Condensed and it was made by Nagtype (I think). I can't seem to find it anywhere, and I though maybe someone here could help.

Thank you,

Karl
author: drtao

comments.content: I thought Heofler & Frere-Jones had a typeface called Odeon (with condensed), but when I checked on their website I could not find it.
Where can I find Heofler & Frere-Jones' web site?
